mapper.select: SELECT s.memno, s.squantity, p.pno, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pimg_main, p.pbrand, p.pquantity, p.pstatus_mcd FROM shopping_cart s JOIN product p ON s.pno = p.pno WHERE memno = #{memno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING_CART ( MEMNO, PNO, SQUANTITY ) SELECT #{memno}, #{product.pno}, #{product.pquantity} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SHOPPING_CART WHERE MEMNO = #{memno} AND PNO = #{product.pno} )
